synthesis_conditions.gelation_studies: formed gel in mixed aqueous solvents
synthesis_conditions.minimum_gel_concentrations: similar for individual enantiomers, slightly higher for RS-AlaTA
synthesis_conditions.thermal_stability: RR- and SS-AlaTA similar and higher than RS-AlaTA; trimesic amides higher than terephthalate
synthesis_conditions.rheology_experiments: similar mechanical strength for enantiomeric gel networks, slightly higher than RS-AlaTA; trimesic gels stiffer

synthesis_conditions.space_group: P3121 for MOM-1 a, P3221 for MOM-1 b
synthesis_conditions.chirality_induction: due to helicity of 4PNA induced by metal coordination

synthesis_conditions.space_group: P3121 for MOM-2 a, P3221 for MOM-2 b

synthesis_conditions.enantioselectivity: similar to AlaTA and AlaTME gels
synthesis_conditions.enhanced_enantioselectivity: for trimesic gelators due to additional chiral center
